item.title: [Python] What automation should I do in RPA, VBA, or programming languages?
item.description: It is called business automation, but there are many tools for automation. You mean, "You don't have to use that special tool for that task!?" So, I tried to categorize by business type, environment, user type, etc. 1. Automation of core operations (accounting, HR, CRM, ERP, etc.) RPA recommendation level: ☆☆☆☆☆ Don’t hesitate to introduce packaged software for human resources, salary, management accounting, supply chain, cost accounting, CRM, etc. for basic business as a company independent of the industry and automation of business unique to the industry.

item.title: [Python] Run Blue Prism process using Python (SOAP)
item.description: Introduction With Blue Prism, a process (robot) can be exposed as a WebService and can be executed externally. In this article, I’ll write a client in Python and call a Blue Prism process. There are two prerequisites for running the process exposed as a WebService. Another article and set the preconditions. A. Blue Prism server service is running B. public There is a runtime resource started by the switch.

item.title: [Python] What I have learned in the past year as an old man (age mismatch)
item.description: # Overview Write what you are learning every day as an elderly person. I am inspired by how younger generations are eager to learn technology. Since the front and Web systems are too various to be able to keep up with learning, I specialize in the fields of my interest. By the way, there is no organization theory or anything like that. Self-introduction Soon to be 50 years old (looks like “is that right?
